about_the_game:
Story Overview

A mundane daily life drama,
Familiar and nostalgic scenery.
Xiao Su, an ordinary art college applicant, possesses a unique ability - to observe the landscapes in others' hearts.
Before the start of his senior year, Xiao Su is transferred by his father to an art class in No.33 Middle School. There, he reunites with his elementary school classmate and now fellow classmate, Chen Kongling.
Despite the reunion, Xiao Su doesn't feel much nostalgia towards Kongling. On this day, in the art classroom, Xiao Su meets his classmate Xia Chuhe and her close friend, Ye Siyan.
To Xiao Su's surprise, he discovers that Ye Siyan, though small in stature, shares his ability to peer into others' hearts.
Thus begins the tense life of senior year, as students challenge their monthly exam scores in a bid to participate in the last sports meet of high school.
And so, the story begins.

Game Features

  • The debut work of Magenta Factory.
  • Multiple storylines and endings.
  • Beautiful game graphics with unified style in characters and scenes, perfectly harmonized.
  • A relaxing game pace with plain yet refreshing storylines.
  • Many game scenes are based on real locations, which you might have visited.

Note for Ancient Game

As this game was released in 2011, compared to recent releases, this title features:
  • No voice acting.
  • A 4:3 aspect ratio.
  • Graphics are resampled, not remastered.
Please be aware of these objective aspects of the game.

highlighted.name: 新晋姐弟三人的新一年

Familiar and nostalgic scenery.

Before the start of his senior year, Xiao Su is transferred by his father to an art class in No.33 Middle School. There, he reunites with his elementary school classmate and now fellow classmate, Chen Kongling.
Despite the reunion, Xiao Su doesn't feel much nostalgia towards Kongling. On this day, in the art classroom, Xiao Su meets his classmate Xia Chuhe and her close friend, Ye Siyan.
To Xiao Su's surprise, he discovers that Ye Siyan, though small in stature, shares his ability to peer into others' hearts.
Thus begins the tense life of senior year, as students challenge their monthly exam scores in a bid to participate in the last sports meet of high school.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2

name: East 73: Magenta Fairytale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 / DirectX 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Stunning visuals and a fantastical daily Nanjing story unfold. Xiao Su, who sees into others' hearts, joins a new school's art class. He encounters familiar and new faces, exploring their inner worlds and confronting his own hidden depths.
